outlined.description: Styles the datepicker as an outlined text field. (label or placeholder required)

input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

label.description: A text caption or description for the datepicker, which use the input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

disabled.description: Styles the datepicker as a disabled text field.

required.description: Styles the datepicker as a required text field.

fullwidth.description: Styles the datepicker as a full width text field.

end-aligned.description: Styles the datepicker with an end-aligned input.

icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

with-leading-icon.description: Styles the datepicker as a text field with a leading icon. (Use with `before` slot)

with-trailing-icon.description: Styles the datepicker as a text field with a trailing icon. (Use with `after` slot)
